title: Furnished room av
posting_body: My partner Elizabeth and I are searching for someone to occupy what has been our spare room/office.
Specifically, a student or young professional is preferred.
The room comes furnished with the desk, tv, bed, etc.
The utilities and wifi are included!
The location is great and located within the gated community of The Fountains Country Club.
This room is perfect for students.
It is 20 minutes from Keiser University, 10 minutes from PBSC, and 1 minutes from FAU.
The turnpike is less than a mile away.
Great restaurants and activities are in the area.
Several nice community pools are a stone throw away.
A sports complex is on property if interested and recreation parks with water sports are across the street.
Just Elizabeth and1 and1 year old working students.
We hope to meet a nice mellow, clean, and quiet roommate.
